tool_description: get all social profiles from the domain
title: get domain social profiles

api_list.name: social_links
api_list.description: find social_links from any domain name!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-domain-social-profiles.p.rapidapi.com/social_links/{domain}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-domain-social-profiles.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
